'''Evan''' is the friend of [[Chuck Thompson]].

==History==
Evan was at his friend, Chuck's bachelor party when Chuck swallowed a fish from the bar's aquarium on a dare. Evan took him to the hospital, but also slammed Chuck's hand in the door on the way in. He stayed at the hospital while Chuck had surgery to remove the fish and repair his hand. He was then shocked when Chuck's fiancée, [[Roxanne]], came to the hospital and dumped him due to his stupidity.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
He and [[Chuck Thompson]] are friends.
